markdownRemark.html:
I have been listening to the Java Posse podcast recently. They cover general Java news and Java information. They also have some excellent interviews with industry VIPs.

If you are using iTunes, you can use the following link to add them to your list of podcasts.

frontmatter.title: Jax Code Camp 2009 coming this August
Jason Delmore the new Product Manager for ColdFusion
